original: This makes reading the reports indoctrinated policy wonks write difficult to read because when they write about “immigrants” it is unclear if they actually mean lawfully present immigrants or if they are using the word as a euphemism for illegal aliens.

generated_text: The newspapers often criticized either the British government for "playing politics" (treating the state funeral as if it were a meeting for negotiations) or for how it handled the Saudi and Chinese delegations, or the Americans.
original: Indeed, what criticisms the newspapers aired were generally aimed either at the British government, for ‘playing politics’ (as if any state funeral is not an impromptu summit) or clumsily handling the Saudi and Chinese delegations or the Americans.
